divs: Sighting DetailsI was in the middle of baja mexico driving to the states, and as sunset approached I notice a rocket shooting across the sky very fast with a huge amount of smoke coming out of it. I left a huge smoke line across the horizon and another smoke form of question mark were it took off about 100 miles away. First I thought was plane, then rocket, then missle. Two cars pulled over that driving in the opposite direction to watch it hover. When I looked back and saw it hovering I thought I was going to die or get abducted, I started driving faster in the other direction, it starting get dark and I lost sight of it but it was the most remarkable thing I ever saw. It was a black cylinder shape object about 500 yds long and 100 yds wide and about 1000ft above the earth with 4 lights coming out of it and two were beaming at the earth. I have a small video of it.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Rosario
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Saw a rocket go across horizon very fast with huge smoke behind it then it was 1/2 mile behind me. Two cars going the opposite way as I was driving from Cabo, Mex to the US pulled overed to watch it hover. It was black in color and 4 lights beaming down
